name: Nicholas Romano
text: Great staff who were very polite, even though were clearly busy with orders. Place very clean.

name: Kylie Hayes
text: WOW. GREAT customer service. I placed an online order in which I took off the ham and pork from the super supreme pizza; however, I left the sausage on the pizza. One of the employees called to confirm that I would still be okay with pork ‚Ä¶More

name: Hunter Mills
text: The employees are always great, food is consistently good, andelivery is hot and fast. I gave one star because I get a message saying I can get free pizza. Just take this survey. Which turns into another and another and it just keeps going. ‚Ä¶More

name: Krissy Richardson
text: This location is great always order delivery so never been to the store. Always on time and cooked to perfection. Driver is always nice and friendly.

name: N London
text: Great place for lunch!! Friendly staff keeps the buffet replenished and will make whatever pizza you ask.  Food is delicious.

name: Destiny
text: So this is the second time I have ordered from this pizza hut location and their driver has lied. I placed an order for my pizza to be delivered I place it around 4:15pm and was informed that it will be delivered at 4:55pm. It was going on ‚Ä¶More

name: Aosaa
text: This is my third time coming to this Location and the pizza here is always burnt looking. Keep in mind I‚Äôve given this location three separate chances. Thinking it was a fluke. But no, they just make over cooked pizza all the time here. ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Wheeler
text: Good fast service

name: bobby lee swagga
text: Good n staff were terrific

name: Madalyn Allen
text: The female at the register seemed super annoyed that we were there to pick up a pizza. Even calling and ordering the pizza the guy on the phone just sounded like he was annoyed I called. The pizza itself was JACKED UP when they showed it to ‚Ä¶More

name: Benjamin Martin
text: I've been craving pizza for a while so I got carryout. I've been a longtime fan of Pizza Hut and prefer them over others but i just wasn't impressed with the quality of the pizza or the ingredients. I don't know if it's this location or overall, but it'll be a while before I go back.

name: clint dalton
text: I was greeted as I walked in.  I felt welcome. The buffet is over at 1:30, so don't walk in at 1:20 and expect to get new stuff on the buffet, fyi.  I got a personal pan meal, took about 7 minutes for a fresh pizza. Only have 4 stars cuz that leaves room to grow. I was not disappointed in my meal.

name: Cyrenea Sorsby
text: Online delivery time showed 55-65 mins.  10 mins after it was due I called to check and was told it was leaving the store right then.  35 mins later finally got my pizza.  Driver said they were having computer problems and were being given ‚Ä¶More

name: Joseph Douthit
text: The pizza was stale, semi warm and only one employee even attempted to assist during the buffet. We had to wait almost 15 minutes to get any pizza from buffet because they weren't being put out in time. The drinks were limited, but that was the best of the whole experience. For the money spent, the buffet is not worth it.

name: Michelle Doring
text: Best pizza!! The staff is very friendly amd service was fast!! They even open the boxes, to show you exactly what you ordered,  to ensure it is correct!! This is our go to for work orders!!

name: Pamela Baker
text: My pizza always made right and hot this location is a good place to dine and carry out

name: sw3d501
text: The best of the chains.  Good, hot, fast and reasonably priced.  The fried boneless chicken wings (a.k.a nuggets) are surprisingly good, equal to the ones at ZaZa.

name: Elizabeth Whitley
text:
I'm leaving my original post below as a testament to how far they've come.
I had the best experience the past two times I've been there. I believe after my original post (which was probably 3 years ago) they've undergone new ‚Ä¶More

name: Michelle E.
text: Fast, friendly service. Good pizza, many possible combinations of crust flavors, sauces and toppings. Almost always get it right.

name: Summer Ashleigh
text: Pizza hut never lets me down üòç 100% on time and everything is always correct and hot. Seriously the best delivery in my area ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Andrew Cassinelli
text: Nice friendly staff. Well stocked buffet. I wish that the pizza were better but that's Pizza Hut.

name: William N
text: Ordered deep dish and received a hand tossed pizza. Figures.

name: Henry Lee Toliver III
text: Great place to work and eat! Great staff as well as great food! I recommend this place to ANYONE who is craving Pizza Hut!!

name: Boo Yeah
text: This pizza melted in my mouth (figuratively speaking of course). I walked in and ordered the bacon cheeseburger pizza. They got it out in about 10 minutes. The employees were attentive and smiling when i walked in. Great job guys.

name: Jordan White
text: I'm a waiter.  I know the kitchen life.  So when I order two pizzas damn near closing time, I'm okay with it being 10 minutes late.  My pizzas arrived exactly as I ordered them and the driver was really chill.  I order from this location all the time and I've never had a reason to complain.  Keep calm, keep Sriracha.

name: Jessica Clay
text: Good fresh and hot food everytime

name: Sambonsai
text: Called for delivery at 9:30 pm. Gave them my address. They said I was out of their area and they hung up. They were 2.8 miles away. I was disappointed and upset because I thought this was a reputable franchise that has consistent quality of ‚Ä¶More

name: Roderick Wells
text: Pizza seems not to be good anymore. The toppings don't seem fresh and I never get enough sauce. It seems we have to put extra sauce and cheese for it to come out good anymore. The wings are still good lol.

text: Everytime I order from them the pizza is half cooked.  The pizza box is also always bent and seems to be poorly handled. The last time I ordered from them the delivery guy handed me my pizza and then went on to say  he wasted pasta sauce on my box.
